participant_1.background:
My family is very supportive of my dream to be an actor.
I train to stay in peak physical condition for my job.
I'm retired and enjoy spending time with my black lab.
i like to dance with my friends.
i enjoy making 3d models for video games and animations.

participant_2.background:
My family is very supportive of me and they help me to cope with my anxiety.
i collect bugs in jars.
i build my own computers.
I enjoyed Comic Con with my husband last year.
I enjoy cooking ethnic foods and listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers.

content.text: Hey! I'm good, how about you?
Pretty good, thanks. I'm a retired actor who enjoys spending time with my dog and dancing with my friends.
That's awesome! I'm a stay-at-home mom who enjoys collecting bugs in jars, building computers, and cooking ethnic food.
Wow, those are all really cool hobbies! I've always wanted to build my own computer.
It's not too hard, and it's really rewarding when you're finished.
I might have to give it a try.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I've also always been interested in collecting bugs, but I'm not sure where to start.
There are a lot of great resources online that can help you get started. You can also find bugs in your backyard or local park.
That's a great idea, I'll have to do some research.
Awesome! I'm sure you'll love it.
